text:
Looking at this historical letter, I can identify the following information:

- The letter is dated "Basel, den 29.März 1926" (Basel, March 29, 1926)
- It's addressed to "Herrn Dr.W.Kresting" 
- The subject line indicates it's about "Internationale Ausstellung für Binnenschiffahrt und Wasserkraftnutzung Basel 1926" (International Exhibition for Inland Shipping and Water Power Utilization Basel 1926)
- The letter is signed "Hochachtungsvoll" (Respectfully) but no sender name is visible in the image
- There is no explicit title beyond the subject line
